Upload a cover file

Hederis:Convert will automatically include your book cover in the generated EPUB file, and will include any image files that are in your book text. To include cover and images files, upload them before you upload your Word manuscript, as indicated on the Hederis:Convert user interface.

To designate an image as the cover image, simply click on it to select it.
